Spring 2026 Schedule -- ONU Observatory



Friday, Feb 13, 7:00-9:00 pm. -- Public Event. "Jupiter Divides the Twins"

Friday, Mar 6, 7:30-9:30 pm. -- Public Event. "Comets in the Western Sky"

Friday, Mar 20, 8:30-10:30 pm. -- Public Event. "Spring Equinox Star Party"

Friday, Apr 10, 9:00-11:00 pm. -- Public Event. "Galaxies of Spring"

Friday, Apr 24, 9:00-11:00 pm. -- Public Event. "Polar Preview Star Party"
Maps to the ONU Observatory: https://jpastro.net/astro/ONUObservatory.html
For weather cancellations see: https://jpastro.net/astro/publicevents.html
